laboratory_examinations.findings: Moderately severe subcortical white matter disease.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Striking increase in both gray and white matter lesion volumes over 4 years; total brain volume remained relatively constant.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Scores: 28 out of 30 at initial evaluation; 16 at 15-month visit; 21 at 18-month visit; 25 at 24-month visit.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive decline in cognitive function observed, with scores dropping from 28 to 16 and then partially improving to 21 and 25.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Blood Chemistries, CBC, and Thyroid Profile

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initiated a course of monthly vitamin B12 injections.
